value.title: Waymo CEO John Krafcik steps down, replaced by two co-CEOs

value.title: Didi seeks to raise $6 billion for its self driving unit: Report
value.excerpt: Didi Chuxing is apparently raising funds for the growth of its autonomous driving unit.
